Posts.Content: Thanks bestbird, I hear trials phase 3 start in UK near us Sept 2019. And your book is really useful, our oncologist now has a copy courtesy of me. Is There any evidence do you know if it crosses the Blood brain barrier? Jay
Posts.Title: New Promising Experimental Drug

Posts.Content: Hi bestbird, That's new information to me and really helps. Thank you so much. We are thinking about jumping to this drug whilst fundraising for cart t cell. And that new info makes it worth giving it a go. Jay
Posts.Title: New Promising Experimental Drug
